title: FS: PSA Graded, 16 T206s, 1 T207 Tinker, added a T3 Downey
author: npa589

posts.post_title: FS: PSA Graded, 16 T206s, 1 T207 Tinker, added a T3 Downey
posts.post_content:
All prices include delivery, payment through Paypal goods is more than fine. If you're willing to pay with Payment Owed, I will discount further. 

E-mail better than pm: [url]the.cards.of.our.pastime@gmail.com[/url]

T206s include a few Sov 460s.

I don't see a zoom option on photobucket, but if you download the scans, you'll get a view of the card that presents every flaw. I actually wonder if the scans are too good, the cards always look better in person. If you have any questions, let me know.


List:

1909-11 T206: Admiral Schlei "Portrait w/ cap" Sovereign 460  PSA 4
1909-11 T206: BOB HALL "Portrait, Baltimore" Sweet Caporal 350  PSA 2.5
1909-11 T206: Harry Howell "Hand at Waist" Sovereign 460   PSA 4
1909-11 T206: JACK DUNN "Fielding, Baltimore" Piedmont 350 25 PSA 2
1909-11 T206: Joe Doyle "N.Y. Hands Above Head" Sovereign 350  PSA 4
1909-11 T206: Rube Geyer "Follow Through"  Sovereign 460  PSA 1
1909-11 T206: TERRY TURNER "Portrait, Cleveland" Piedmont 150 PSA 3
1912 T207 Brown: JOE TINKER "Chicago Cubs" PSA 3
1911 T3 Turkey Red Cigarettes: TOM DOWNEY "Cincinnati, Ad Back" SGC 30



Scans/prices here: 


[url]http://s1307.beta.photobucket.com/user/the_coop/library/T206%20T207?[/url]




.

Friendly bump for Nate for a great transaction.  My card arrived today and I couldn't be happier.

I'd also recommend that you check out his tenor videos on youtube.  Very impressive stuff and cool to see the different things that board members are up to.

Thanks Jeff, I really appreciate it... I hope you enjoy your card!


Yea, about my tenor videos on YouTube, if anyone has any connections to the Cubs --- my dream is to sing the National Anthem at Wrigley Field. :D

I will take the Al Bridwell PSA 3-Sov 460 if still available. Will pay va Paypal gift or Money owed.

Regards
John P
